data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_4b96c75b136290576d849309722d4d20.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Ruby starts with 5% Spell Vamp and her skills have a 125% Spell Vamp Ratio (but her Basic Attacks cannot trigger Lifesteal).

After each skill cast, Ruby can dash to another location and gain 7.5 (+1.5*Hero Level) Physical & Magic Defense (scales with level) for 4s (stacks up to 3 times).

Ruby swings her scythe, dealing 90<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit. She then unleashes a shockwave in the same direction, dealing 90<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 40% for 1s.

Ruby swings her scythe around herself twice, each swing dealing 60<font color="fba51f"> (+55% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies, stunning them for 0.5s, and slowly pulling them toward her.

Ruby sweeps her scythe in the target direction, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit, pulling them toward her, and stunning them for 0.5s.

data.name: Ruby

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: High recovery to tank through teamfights.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+10% Spell Vamp
+22 Adaptive Attack
+6 Extra Physical Defense
+6 Extra Magic Defense

emblemskill.skilldesc: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num1> Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional <%Num2> Spell Vamp, up to <Num3> stacks.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers <%Num1> of Max HP.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num2>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%

equiplist.equipskill1:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+12% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskill2: Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Adaptive Attack
+600 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+10% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+850 Extra Max HP
+20 Extra Physical Defense
+20 Extra Magic Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+600 Extra Max HP
+23 Extra Physical Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

recommendmasterplan.name: TEA
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: A girl who grew up with Roger's help.

assist.desc: Ruby works best with heroes who can deal high AOE burst damage. Their skills can deal more damage to enemies who are stunned and pulled by her 2nd and Ultimate skills. Such as Pharsa and Kadita.

strong.desc: Ruby is strong against Fighter heroes with high burst damage. She can easily survive their burst with her excellent Regen and Lifesteal abilities. Such as Aldous and Guinevere.

weak.desc: Ruby is countered by Marksman heroes with good Mobility. Because they can easily dodge her 2nd and Ultimate skills. Like Wanwan and Irithel.
